original_text: Now the cherubim were standing on the south side of the house, when the man went in, and a cloud filled the inner court.
korean_text: 그 사람이 들어갈 때에 그룹들은 성전 오른쪽에 서 있고 구름은 안뜰에 가득하며

sentences.original_text: Now the cherubim were standing on the south side of the house
sentences.korean_translation: 그때 그룹들이 집의 남쪽에 서 있었는데

sentences.original_text: and a cloud filled the inner court
